response_headers.Content-Security-Policy: connect-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr https://in-automate.brevo.com/; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; object-src 'none'; worker-src blob:; frame-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr https://www.youtube.com https://www.dailymotion.com https://aides-territoires-metabase.osc-fr1.scalingo.io; script-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr https://aides-territoires-metabase.osc-fr1.scalingo.io https://sibautomation.com 'nonce-8RQZiGSM984wjsS6X/o5OQ=='; default-src https://*.scw.cloud; font-src 'self'; frame-ancestors *; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://stats.data.gouv.fr https://*.scw.cloud https://*.forte.tiles.quaidorsay.fr

content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented with unsafe sources inside style-src. This includes 'unsafe-inline', data: or overly broad sources such as https:.

contribute.name: contribute
contribute.score_description: Contribute.json isn't required on websites that don't belong to Mozilla

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Content is not visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) files or headers

public-key-pinning.name: public-key-pinning
public-key-pinning.score_description: HTTP Public Key Pinning (HPKP) header not implemented

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Initial redirection is to HTTPS on same host, final destination is HTTPS

strict-transport-security.name: strict-transport-security
strict-transport-security.score_description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header set to a minimum of six months (15768000)

subresource-integrity.name: subresource-integrity
subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) not implemented, but all external scripts are loaded over HTTPS

x-frame-options.name: x-frame-options
x-frame-options.score_description: X-Frame-Options (XFO) implemented via the CSP frame-ancestors directive

x-xss-protection.name: x-xss-protection
x-xss-protection.score_description: X-XSS-Protection header not needed due to strong Content Security Policy (CSP) header
